name: stock_v2_get_analysis_report
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches detailed information about a stock based on the provided performance ID.

performanceid.description: Value of the performance ID field, typically obtained from endpoints such as /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers.
